definition[0]: if you are overdrawn or if your bank account is overdrawn, you have spent more than you had in your account and so you owe the bank money
example[0]: I try not to go overdrawn if possible.

definition[1]: to be in or to get into a situation where you owe the bank money on an overdraft
example[2]: You are entitled to free banking, even when your account is overdrawn.
